django.utils.topological_sort
=============================

.. py:module:: django.utils.topological_sort


Exceptions
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.topological_sort.CyclicDependencyError


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.topological_sort.topological_sort_as_sets
   django.utils.topological_sort.stable_topological_sort


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: CyclicDependencyError

   Bases: :py:obj:`ValueError`


   Inappropriate argument value (of correct type).


.. py:function:: topological_sort_as_sets(dependency_graph)

   Variation of Kahn's algorithm (1962) that returns sets.

   Take a dependency graph as a dictionary of node => dependencies.

   Yield sets of items in topological order, where the first set contains
   all nodes without dependencies, and each following set contains all
   nodes that may depend on the nodes only in the previously yielded sets.


.. py:function:: stable_topological_sort(nodes, dependency_graph)
